Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>WAAAH!


<sp:3:0:2:0901>Don't scare me like that! My poor heart
can't take it!

<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice>Eh?<sp:5:1:0> Are you by chance looking for
<clr:0000>Bubbulfrogs<clr:ffff> too?
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey, I ran into you before, didn't I...<sp:5:1:0>
at the cave.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Caves are really dangerous. Is finding
<clr:0000>Bubbul gems<clr:ffff> even worth it?
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>You're...<sp:5:1:0>the one who was searching
for the same Bubbulfrog I was, if I'm
not mistaken.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Supposedly, there are creatures called
<clr:0000>Bubbulfrogs<clr:ffff> that live in caves.

They're bluish and whitish and stick to
walls. Odd stuff.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>And those two folks at <clr:0000>Woodland Stable<clr:ffff>
in northeast Eldin—curious pair, very
strange, maybe a little off...
They're looking for something the
<clr:0000>Bubbulfrogs drop<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0> They asked me to
do the collecting.
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>They offered treasure in exchange.
Good treasure! It was a sweet deal.<sp:5:0:0>
At least, it would have been...
But I don't know the first thing about
cave creatures.<sp:0:4:0>That treasure was awful appealing
though...
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Eh? Ah, you again.


Caves are dangerous, you know. Is finding
<clr:0000>Bubbul gems<clr:ffff> even worth it?
Talk_19: <sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh.<sp:5:0:0> What a shame, what a shame...
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>I'm done looking for Bubbul gems.
Done. Done!

And you should be done too, or you'll
end up a funny color, just like the guy at
Woodland Stable!
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>That said, it's a shame about that
treasure... <sp:5:0:0>I'd never even heard of a
<clr:0000>mystic robe<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0> Maybe...
No!<sp:5:0:0> I'm definitely done!<sp:5:0:0> Definitely...
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>But that treasure... Ooh, it's hard to give
up a trade like that...
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'm just going to cross my fingers and
wish real hard that I'll get the treasure
without any effort whatsoever.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's in the name. Some kind of weird thing
<clr:0000>Bubbulfrogs <clr:ffff>drop in caves.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>All I know is that it glows a bluish white,
just like the Bubbulfrog.

Eh?<sp:5:0:0> Wait a second...


That strange pair over at <clr:0000>Woodland Stable<clr:ffff>
in Eldin to the northeast—the ones who
asked me to find <clr:0000>Bubbul gems<clr:ffff>...
One of them was bluish white. Odd color.


<sp:3:0:2:0b00>You don't think he got cursed by a
Bubbulfrog, do you?!

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Ooh, this is really dangerous. When things
sound too good, there's always a catch...
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>After we met, curiosity got the better of
me and I decided to go looking for a
Bubbulfrog in a cave.
But that was...not a great idea. <sp:5:0:0>Caves are
dark, and there's no way to know what's
lurking around in there.
Plus, that strange duo... They just up and
disappeared from Woodland Stable!
Talk_31: <sp:3:0:2:0701>Ah,<sp:5:0:0> I ran into you recently, didn't I?
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>What?!<sp:5:1:0> You got your hands on a
<clr:0000>Bubbul gem<clr:ffff>?!

You had the courage to not only go in a
cave but to face down a strange creature?
You're a brave one, that's for sure.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Aha! I knew it! They must have asked
you too.
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>After that, I didn't really know what to do
with myself...so I did some wandering and
some thinking too, and ended up here.
And you know, I've decided that I'm a
careful man, and I'll take comfort and
safety over rewards and riches any day.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hi there.<sp:5:1:0> You look like someone on
a real journey.
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ugh, this is some awful weather
we're having.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>If you've made your way to a stable in
this kind of downpour, you must be
quite the traveler.
Talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The thing is,<sp:5:0:0> stables are very pleasant
places to be—comfortable, safe.

Bubbulfrog hunting in a dark cave...<sp:5:0:0>no,
thanks. A cautious guy like me is better
suited to relaxing in a place like this.
Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>Turns out <clr:0000>Bubbulfrogs<clr:ffff> can be found
<clr:0000>in every cave<clr:ffff>. So I'm thinking I'll maybe
check out another cave.
Though, I doubt I'll be able to find one
that isn't dark and scary.
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Good evening.<sp:5:1:0> You look like someone on
quite a journey.
Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you managed to get your hands on
a Bubbul gem...<sp:0:4:0>you should try to find those two
oddballs at <clr:0000>Woodland Stable<clr:ffff> in
Eldin to the northeast.
Those fellas were in a real frenzy to find
those gems. I bet you'll find them in the
<clr:0000>cave near the stable<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:QuestionNormal>I heard them talking about some rare
treasure they had. I think it was a
<clr:0000>mystic robe<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0>or something like that.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Yeah, might not be a bad idea to go
see them.
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>So, strange story... I ran into these two
folks—curious pair, odd even—at
Woodland Stable up north in Eldin...
And they asked me to search for this
creature called a Bubbulfrog that's
supposed to be found in caves.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>But the thing about caves is...<sp:5:0:0>they're
dark, and you don't know what's hiding
in them.
Plus, the pair in question just up and
disappeared from the stable.
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Still though...<sp:5:1:0> I do wonder where that
strange duo looking for the Bubbulfrogs
disappeared to.
With that <clr:0000>motley-looking cart<clr:ffff> they
were pulling, you'd think they'd be
easy to spot anywhere...
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>These <clr:0000>Bubbulfrog <clr:ffff>creatures are supposed
to live in caves, eh?
